entry.title: Editor - document #269: OCCI - Core document
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The respective public comment forums (eng?) have been created.

entry.title: Editor - document #269: OCCI - Core document
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Richard Hughes-Jones

Dear authors/editors: The OCCI document public comment has completed. There have been some comments received. The next step is for you to consider whether any changes are needed to the submitted documents, and if so the changes should be applied. Then, use this tracker to inform the standards council the documents are ready for final review prior to publication. Write back, here or via email, with any questions or concerns. Thanks,
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #269: OCCI - Core document
entry.content:
Per the Standards Council telecon December 8, Jens will reach out to the group to ensure they are aware that author/editor action is needed in order to move these documents forward. This includes responding as appropriate to received public comments. Status is the same for all pending OCCI documents. 

    OCCI - Core document
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/269
    OCCI - Compute Resource Templates Profile
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/270
    OCCI - HTTP Protocol
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/271
    OCCI - Infrastructure
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/272
    OCCI - JSON rendering
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/273
    OCCI - monitoring
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/274
    OCCI - Platform
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/275
    OCCI - SLAs
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/276
    OCCI - Text rendering
     https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/277
    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #269: OCCI - Core document
entry.content: Per the standards telecon of May 17, all OCCI documents need their source updated, and Alan is working o this (i.e., the correct IP statement & copyright date). This applies to all pending OCCI docs.
